mapper.select: SELECT * FROM car WHERE car_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{carName}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car (car_name, car_price, car_color, car_type, car_img, production_date) VALUES (#{carName},#{carPrice},#{carColor},#{carType},#{carImg},#{productionDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE car SET car_name = #{carName}, car_price = #{carPrice}, car_color = #{carColor}, car_type = #{carType}, car_img = #{carImg}, production_date = #{productionDate}, WHERE car_id=#{carId}
